name: Riya Travel & Tour
tag_list: cheap-flights, cheap-flights-tickets, cheap-vacation-packages, cheap-air-fares, cheap-hotels, cruises, travel, tour, air-india, emirates, qatar
overview: Riya provides all travel related information and bookings to a host of travel related services to make your business and leisure travel seamless. With a turnover over $1 billion it is one of the fastest growing travel company with key focus area being customer satisfaction. Dallas being our North American Headquarter, and our presence felt very strong in north eastern USA in New York, New Jersey and Philadelphia with 47 international locations. Mumbai (Bombay) is our global Headquarter
